DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess pharmacokinetics of rabeprazole under postprandial condition.
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Cross-over Bioequivalence Study of E3810 for Healthy Japanese Male (Under Postprandial Condition)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Subjects with homozygous or heterozygous extensive metabolizers of cytochrome P4502C19 Exclusion criteria: Subjects with allergy
